featured.name: bamboo
featured.description: Developed web app and Chrome extension to help study Mandarin. Users can add words to they are learning to their library, and are shown words every time they open a new tab in Chrome.

featured.name: Michelle Calligraphy
featured.description: Worked to develop user friendly web app to interface with 3D printer-like robot capable of drawing calligraphy. TOM is an organization dedicated to pairing engineers with disabled persons to create solutions to their specific needs.

all.name: Nuclear Codes
all.description: Created text-based, multiplayer socket game. Agents try and figure out a passcode while spies try and prevent them.

all.name: MTA Clock
all.description: Created a cuckoo-style wall clock to track subways at my stop using an AWS Lambda and Arduino.

all.name: earlybird
all.description: Designed and developed website that allows users to draft and schedule tweets using Flask on Heroku.

all.name: Space Fighters
all.description: Expanded on multiplayer space shooting game built in college for UX course. Players join and are placed onto teams, stay alive to rack up your team's score, get taken out and the other team steals your points.

all.name: NightPro
all.description: Created an ffmpeg Python package wrapper to combine GoPro nightlapse photos into timelapse videos.

all.name: breadcrumbs
all.description: Developed a map annotation application in Python Flask and Angular on Heroku. Users can draw line segments anywhere on a map and comment on every vertex.

all.name: Canvas Animations
all.description: Designed an array of animated visuals using the HTML5 Canvas.

all.name: witebord
all.description: Developed socket drawing app using Node and Socket.io. Users can create a room and share it with friends to all draw together.

all.name: Run Calculator
all.description: Constructed minimalist website to calculate running pace on desktop and mobile  using CSS, JavaScript and jQuery. This was my very first website.

all.name: ML Asteroids
all.description: Attempted to teach the game Asteroids to a computer using JavaScript and Phaser.
